liquibase.change.AddLookupTableChange

liquibase.change.AddLookupTableChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.AddLookupTableChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Extracts data from an existing column to create a lookup table.

A foreign key is created between the old column and the new lookup table.
